Cook it your way

1

Season

Your blank canvas. Go wild or keep it simple with salt & pepper.

2

Heat

Oil in pan. Get it hot. Don't be shy — high heat is your friend.

3

Cook

Golden brown on all sides. 3-4 minutes per side. Done.

6-8 min Cook time
Medium-High Heat
3-4 Servings
